annotations.description: With the disappointing release of Fallout 76 I'm feeling nostalgic for the original, and creating an original cocktail to go with it. Come on down to Vault H...
annotations.title: Fallout Stimpak Shot | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lemon Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Ginger Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Vodka
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Suze

Shake and strain into two shot glasses

title: Stimpack Shot
